column4: Is there a way I can disable a certian error from coming up in Ubuntu Server? I keep getting a USB error, and it prevents me from being able to enter any commands because it comes up a couple times every second, is there a way I can stop this so I can actually use the server?
What is the USB error?  Elaborate.
the error is: [ Some kind of timer] :  hub 1-0:1.0: unable to enumerate USB device on port 4
